ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.0.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.0'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Implement some deep learning architectures and neural network algorithms, including BP,RBM,DBN,Deep autoencoder and so on.
Implement some deep learning architectures and neural network algorithms, including BP,RBM,DBN,Deep autoencoder and so on.

name: r-deepnet
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-deepnet
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/deepnet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/deepnet/deepnet_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0482a45808914213c9b455e1aa49b51a1ed836200c763f6edbfc731170e49925

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('deepnet')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('deepnet')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=deepnet
  summary: Implement some deep learning architectures and neural network algorithms, including BP,RBM,DBN,Deep autoencoder and so on.
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - cofinoa


# Package: deepnet
# Type: Package
# Title: deep learning toolkit in R
# Version: 0.2
# Date: 2014-03-20
# Author: Xiao Rong
# Maintainer: Xiao Rong <runxiao@gmail.com>
# Description: Implement some deep learning architectures and neural network algorithms, including BP,RBM,DBN,Deep autoencoder and so on.
# License: GPL
# Packaged: 2014-03-20 08:06:35 UTC; xiaorong.xr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2014-03-20 10:03:43
